AppDesc.message: It splits your browser windows into two by just 2 clicks

HelpText.message: Choose how you want your browser windows to be organized

MinimizeNote.message: Note: If you have more windows than setup, exceeding windows will be minimized.

MoreInSettings.message: Want more Setup? Add more in Settings.

SingleScreenCurrent.message: Use the screen current window is in

SingleScreenPrimary.message: Use the Primary screen (configured in your OS)
